data.name: Crusader Kings II: South Indian Portraits 5 Year Anniversary Gift
data.detailed_description:
An Heir is Born in Crusader Kings III

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1158310/Crusader_Kings_III/


About the Game

Please note that you might have been granted ownership of this DLC through owning other Crusader Kings II content.

In honor of the 5th Birthday of Crusader Kings II we are giving a celebratory gift to all of our players! Add extra variety to your game with the inclusion of these Southern-Indian inspired portraits.

pc_requirements.minimum:
• OS: XP/Vista/Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel® Pentium® IV 2.4 GHz or AMD 3500+
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Hard Disk Space: 2 GB
  • Video Card: NVIDIA® GeForce 8800 or ATI Radeon® X1900, 512mb graphics memory required.
  • DirectX®: 9.0c
  • Sound: Direct X-compatible sound card
  • Additional: 3-button mouse and keyboard
